tags.name: title-bar
tags.description:
Title bar web component for Electron. Example:
```html
<title-bar windowtitle='Electron UIKit'></title-bar>
```

attributes.name: nominimize
attributes.description: If specified, the title bar will not show the minimization control.

attributes.name: nomaximize
attributes.description: If specified, the title bar will not show the nomaximization control.

attributes.name: noclose
attributes.description: If specified, the title bar will not show the `x` control.
